name: MusicVideos.Attributes
desc: The attributes for a music video resource.

items.name: albumName
items.desc: The name of the album the music video appears on.

items.name: artistName
items.desc: The artist’s name.

items.name: artwork
items.desc: The artwork for the music video’s associated album.

items.name: contentRating
items.desc: The Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) rating of the content. The possible values for this rating are clean and explicit. No value means no rating.

items.name: durationInMillis
items.desc: The duration of the music video in milliseconds.

items.name: editorialNotes
items.desc: The editorial notes for the music video.

items.name: genreNames
items.desc: The music video’s associated genres.

items.name: has4K
items.desc: Whether the music video has 4K content.

items.name: hasHDR
items.desc: Whether the music video has HDR10-encoded content.

items.name: isrc
items.desc: The International Standard Recording Code (ISRC) for the music video.

items.name: name
items.desc: The localized name of the music video.

items.name: playParams
items.desc: The parameters to use to play back the music video.

items.name: previews
items.desc: The preview assets for the music video.

items.name: releaseDate
items.desc: The release date of the music video, when known, in YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY format. Pre-release music videos may have an expected release date in the future.

items.name: trackNumber
items.desc: The number of the music video in the album’s track list, when associated with an album.

items.name: url
items.desc: The URL for sharing the music video in Apple Music.

items.name: videoSubType
items.desc: The video subtype associated with the content.

items.name: workId
items.desc: (Classical music only) A unique identifier for the associated work.

items.name: workName
items.desc: (Classical music only) The name of the associated work.

items.name: artistUrl
items.desc: The url of the artist for this content.
